metadata.title: 2025 Chevrolet Silverado 1500 | Pickup Truck | Chevrolet Canada
metadata.description: The 2025 Silverado 1500 offers advanced interior technology that puts infotainment at your fingertips — keeping you connected almost anywhere the day takes you.

content.p: This is for DRE. Please don't delete. It is hidden

content.heading: CHEVROLET EARNED MORE DEPENDABILITY AWARDS FOR TRUCKS THAN ANY OTHER BRAND *

ul: 40/20/40 split-bench front seat with covered armrest storage and underseat storage
Durabed featuring class-leading cargo volume and 12 standard tie- downs*
TurboMax™ engine with 430 lb.-ft. of torque
Trailering Package, remote vehicle starter system, and EZ Lift power lock and release tailgate
10-way power driver seat including lumbar control and 40/20/40 split-bench front seat with covered armrest storage and under-seat storage

content.p: Strength and style — all day, every day

ul: 13.4-inch diagonal colour touch-screen display and 12.3-inch diagonal reconfigurable Driver Information Centre
Front 40/20/40 split-bench seat and 10-way power driver seat
Available 20-inch painted-aluminum wheels with machined-face and Grazen-painted pockets
LED reflector headlamps and signature daytime running lamps

content.p: Bold and sporty with street-inspired design

ul: Available 5.3L V8, Class- Exclusive * Duramax 3.0L Turbo-Diesel engine, or 6.2L V8 engine
Body-colour centre grille bar, bumpers and door handles
13.4-inch diagonal colour touch-screen display and 12.3-inch diagonal reconfigurable Driver Information Centre
Body-colour centre grille bar, bumpers and door handles
Front 40/20/40 split-bench seat and 10-way power driver seat

content.p: Ready to take on every off-road adventure

ul: Available 5.3L V8 engine or Class- Exclusive * Duramax 3.0L Turbo-Diesel engine
2-inch factory suspension lift and Z71 Off-Road Package
Autotrac® 2-speed transfer case, automatic locking rear differential and skid plates
18-inch high-gloss Black-painted wheels with Goodyear Wrangler Territory® MT tires
Raised hood with styled Black insert
13.4-inch diagonal colour touch-screen display and 12.3-inch diagonal enhanced multicolour reconfigurable Driver Information Centre
Front bucket seats with centre console
Offering 8 cameras with up to 14 views *
Chevrolet Safety Assist * plus additional advanced safety and driver assistance technologies

Premium leather seating surfaces with exclusive custom perforation and stitching pattern and authentic open-pore wood trim

content.p: This is for DRE. Please don't delete. It is hidden

At the heart of every Silverado lies a capable engine that uses the latest advanced technology to deliver impactful performance. Offering four powerful engine choices, including the class- exclusive * Duramax® 3.0L Turbo-Diesel I-6, Silverado delivers strength, dependability and a hefty payload.
TurboMax™ Equipped with Active Fuel Management™ and Automatic Stop/Start
5.3L EcoTec3 V8 Equipped with Dynamic Fuel Management and Automatic Stop/Start
6.2L EcoTec3 V8 Equipped with Dynamic Fuel Management and Automatic Stop/Start
Duramax® 3.0L Turbo-Diesel I-6 Equipped with Automatic Stop/Start
TurboMax™ Standard on WT, Custom, Custom Trail Boss, LT, RST and LT Trail Boss
5.3L EcoTec3 V8 Standard on LTZ and High Country
Available on WT, * Custom Trail Boss, LT, RST and LT Trail Boss
6.2L EcoTec3 V8 Available on RST (Crew Cab 4x4), LT Trail Boss, LTZ (4x4), ZR2 and High Country
Available on Custom Trail Boss, LT, RST, LT Trail Boss, LTZ and High Country

ul: Towing capability of up to 13,300 lb. (6,033 kg) *

content.p: With proven trailering technology and eight available cameras * offering up to 14 views, * Silverado provides everything you need for a long day of towing.

From hitching to driving to parking, Silverado offers advanced camera technologies that are designed to help make your towing job easier from start to finish. Available on Silverado LT, RST, LT Trail Boss, LTZ, ZR2 and High Country.
Trailer Side Blind Zone Alert is a trailering feature that provides visual side-mirror alerts when a moving vehicle is detected in a side blind zone that is extended to trailer lengths.

main_body_content.heading: Super Cruise capability (3-year trial period included)

content.p: Available on High Country, Super Cruise TM capability * (3-year trial period included) * offers hands-free driver assistance, managing speed and steering to keep you refreshed during your adventures — even while towing. Enjoy exploring more kilometres of compatible highways with the most advanced hands-free driving system in its class. *

a.text: Available Super Cruise TM capability (3-year trial period included)

content.p: Super Cruise with Trailering * Allows you to tow your heavy load hands-free. No other competitor offers a hands-free driving system with towing capability.*
Automatic comfort and convenience Automatically adjusts the gap between you and the vehicle ahead for extra stopping distance.
Turn on Activate Super Cruise when the white Super Cruise icon appears on the instrument cluster.
Lights on When the Super Cruise symbol and steering wheel indicator turn green, you’re ready to go hands-free.
Hands off Let go of the wheel and enjoy the largest mapped hands-free driving network in North America.

Advanced interior technology puts infotainment at your fingertips and can even turn your Silverado into a mobile office with an available vehicle data plan * — keeping you connected almost anywhere the day takes you.
Wireless Apple CarPlay® * and Android Auto TM* compatibility
Chevrolet with Google built-in compatibility (subscription[s] required for full functionality)

Enjoy an enhanced in-vehicle experience with available Google built-in * compatibility (subscription[s] required for full functionality), which includes Google Assistant to call/text friends, set reminders or control temperature, and Google Maps to help navigate — all from your centre display.

a.text: Google built-in (subscription[s] required for full functionality)

content.p: Available OnStar® * provides a variety of entertainment and convenience features — including 24/7 access to live OnStar Advisors, on-demand vehicle diagnostics, In-Vehicle Apps* and more.
Silverado ZR2 is most at home when it goes off-road. Outfitted with a long list of performance and capability features, ZR2 has what it takes to tame any trail.

ul: Off-road cut front bumper enables 33.5-degree approach angle
Front and rear electronic locking differentials
33-inch Goodyear Wrangler Territory® MT tires with ZR2-specific 18-inch aluminum wheels
Black chrome grille with Chevy flowtie badge
Exclusive ZR2 interior with 13.4-inch diagonal infotainment touch-screen and 12.3-inch Driver Information Centre

content.p: Whatever you’ve been working toward, Silverado High Country is the reward.
Real wood trim and exclusive leather seating surfaces Standard
Super Cruise TM* hands-free driver assistance capability (3-year trial period included * ) Available

Our lineup of special editions, including the ZR2 Bison Edition offers you choices when it comes to finding the right combination of distinctive looks and gritty capability to suit your personal style.
We set out with AEV to build a beast of an off-road truck so you can tackle wild terrain like never before.

ul: AEV Bison unique front and rear differentials, transfer case and fuel tank skid plates
AEV Bison front and rear bumpers
Multi-Flex Tailgate with unique Black finish
AEV-branded floor liners and head restraints

content.p: With head-turning Red and Black accents, Redline Edition* ensures your Silverado stands out in any crowd. Available on RST.

ul: 20-inch high-gloss Black-painted aluminum wheels with Red accents
Dual exhaust outlets with Black rectangular tips
Black RST and Silverado emblems with Red outline on fender and tailgate
High-intensity discharge LED headlamps with Black bezels

content.p: Dramatically designed to command attention, Silverado Midnight Edition* - is available on Custom Trail Boss, LT Trail Boss and High Country models.

ul: Black appearance with Black badging, recovery hooks, * bed decal, bumpers, dual rectangular exhaust tips and grille
Goodyear Wrangler Territory® MT tires with 18-inch high-gloss Black-painted aluminum wheels on Custom Trail Boss; 20-inch high-gloss Black-painted aluminum wheels on LT Trail Boss and High Country
High-intensity discharge LED headlamps with Black bezels on LT Trail Boss and High Country
Black power-retractable assist steps with rearward articulation (High Country only)

content.p: With its dark demeanour, the Silverado TurboMax Blackout Package shines with blacked-out features and bold style.
Available on Custom and Custom Trail Boss models.

ul: Dark Essentials Package, including Silverado nameplates, Custom and TurboMax badges, bowtie, and tailgate lettering all in Black

content.p: With looks this bold, the street is its showroom. Silverado Rally Edition * is available on Custom and RST models.

ul: Black hood and tailgate rally stripes
Black badging, bowtie emblems and tailgate lettering and Black exhaust tip(s)

content.p: 2,523 L (89.1 cu. ft.) * Best-in- class * cargo volume
With a flexible 2,523 L (89.1 cu. ft.)* of best-in-class standard cargo volume at your service, you’ll have no problem transporting larger, bulky items like:
The available Multi-Flex Tailgate offers six different functions to help improve loading, unloading and accessing the cargo bed.

img.alt: Multiflex Primary Gate icon of the 2025 Chevrolet Silverado LD.

content.p: Opens from the key fob, a switch inside the truck or a button on the gate.

img.alt: Multiflex Easy Access icon of the 2025 Chevrolet Silverado LD.

content.p: Helps prevent extra-long items from sliding out of the bed.

img.alt: Multiflex Full-Width Step icon of the 2025 Chevrolet Silverado LD.

content.p: The inner gate folds down, allowing you to reach farther into the bed.

img.alt: Multiflex Full-Width Step icon of the 2025 Chevrolet Silverado LD.

content.p: The inner gate folds down into a large step for easy access, capable of holding up to 170 kg (375 lb.).*

img.alt: Multiflex Inner Gate Load Stop icon of the 2025 Chevrolet Silverado LD.

content.p: Helps prevent second-tier items from sliding out of the bed.

img.alt: Multiflex Inner Gate Work Surface icon of the 2025 Chevrolet Silverado LD.

content.p: When opened, provides a place for a laptop or blueprints, as well as second-tier loading.

Every 2025 Silverado comes with standard Chevrolet Safety Assist,* a package of six advanced safety and driver assistance features designed to help give you added peace of mind every time you get in your truck.
Forward Collision Alert and Automatic Emergency Braking
Lane Keep Assist with Lane Departure Warning

content.heading: Additional Safety and Driver Assistance Features

content.p: There’s a lot more to the Chevrolet story and we’re committed to making sure you can start every drive with some peace of mind.

ul: StabiliTrak® Electronic Stability Control System and Traction Control
Tire Pressure Monitoring System (does not apply to spare tire)
Lane Change Alert with Side Blind Zone Alert

content.p: Safety or driver assistance features are no substitute for the driver’s responsibility to operate the vehicle in a safe manner. The driver should remain attentive to traffic, surroundings and road conditions at all times. Visibility, weather and road conditions may affect feature performance. Read the vehicle Owner’s Manual for more important feature limitations and information.

To help keep your vehicles — and your business — running smoothly, Chevrolet Business Elite Dealers offer a range of services like dedicated dealer representatives, work-ready loaner vehicles and extended service hours.
Your safety is very important to us. If you want to determine whether or not there is a recall on your current vehicle or on a vehicle you are considering, visit https://my.gm.ca/chevrolet/en/recalls
